/**
 * A notebook document filter denotes a notebook document by
 * different properties.
 *
 * @since 3.17.0
 */
export type NotebookDocumentFilter = {
	/** The type of the enclosing notebook. */
	notebookType: string;

	/** A Uri [scheme](#Uri.scheme), like `file` or `untitled`. */
	scheme?: string;

	/** A glob pattern. */
	pattern?: string;
} | {
	/** The type of the enclosing notebook. */
	notebookType?: string;

	/** A Uri [scheme](#Uri.scheme), like `file` or `untitled`.*/
	scheme: string;

	/** A glob pattern. */
	pattern?: string;
} | {
	/** The type of the enclosing notebook. */
	notebookType?: string;

	/** A Uri [scheme](#Uri.scheme), like `file` or `untitled`. */
	scheme?: string;

	/** A glob pattern. */
	pattern: string;
};
